```{r cars, , echo=FALSE}
data <- read.csv('owid-covid-data.csv')
bolivia_df <- data %>% 
  filter(location  == "Bolivia")


cols <- c('date', 'total_cases', 'new_cases', 'total_deaths', 'new_deaths', 
                          'total_cases_per_million', 'new_cases_per_million', 'total_deaths_per_million', 'new_deaths_per_million',
                          'new_tests', 'total_tests', 'total_tests_per_thousand', 'new_tests_per_thousand', 'positive_rate')

bolivia_df <- bolivia_df[cols]
bolivia_df <- na.omit(bolivia_df)

colnames(bolivia_df) <- c('Date', 'Total Cases', 'New Cases', 'Total Deaths', 'New Deaths',
                          'Total Cases per Million', 'New Cases per Million', 'Total Deaths per Million', 'New Deaths per Million',
                          'New Tests', 'Total Tests', 'Total Tests per Thousand', 'New Tests per Thousand', 'Positive Rate')


head(bolivia_df)

datatable(bolivia_df, filter = 'top', options = list(
  pageLength = 25, autoWidth = TRUE))

```
